name: ARK Autonomous Technology & Robotics ETF
description: ARK Autonomous Technology & Robotics ETF (ARKC) is an actively managed exchange-traded fund that focuses on investing in companies that are expected to benefit from advancements in autonomous technology and robotics. Launched by ARK Invest, a firm known for its innovative investment strategies, ARKC targets a broad array of sectors, including transportation, automation, and energy, which are pivotal in transforming industries through technological integration. The fund aims to provide investors with exposure to companies involved in the development of autonomous vehicles, robotics, and artificial intelligence, as well as those enhancing various aspects of production and efficiency. Notable holdings in the fund may include firms engaged in autonomous driving technology, drone manufacturing, and robotics in manufacturing and logistics. With a mission to identify disruptive innovation, ARKC leverages in-depth research and analysis to select high-potential companies that are well-positioned to lead in the evolving landscape of technology. The ETF underscores ARK Invest's commitment to transparency and investor education, providing insights into their investment philosophy and research methodologies. By focusing on long-term growth, ARKC aims to capitalize on the rapid advancements in technology that are reshaping industries and improving life quality globally.
